titles: An alarum to England sounding the most fearefull and terrible example of Gods vengeance, that euer was inflicted in this world vpon mankind for sinne: seruing generally as a warning for all people to eschew sinne, lest they partake of the like vengeance. By Robert Gray, preacher of the Word of God.
author: Gray, Robert, 16th/17th cent.
publisher: Printed by S. S[tafford] for Iohn Budge, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the great South dore of S. Paules Church,
notes: Cf. Folger Catalog which reports signatures: A-I, K¹ (A8, possibly blank, lacking, or perhaps printed as K1).
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
